SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine specific toxicity associate combined BKM120 rituximab . II . Evaluate efficacy BKM120 combination rituximab disease . OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study PI3K inhibitor BKM120 . Patients receive PI3K inhibitor BKM120 orally ( PO ) daily day 1-28 rituximab intravenously ( IV ) day 2 , 8 , 15 , 22 course 1 day 1 course 3 , 5 , 7 , 9 , 11 . Courses repeat every 28 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients asymptomatic progression may continue treatment 12 month .
